item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Where there is love there is life." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by mahatma gandhi
item.description: "I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet." -- mahatma gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "It is unwise to be too sure of one's own wisdom. It is healthy to be reminded that the strongest might weaken and the wisest might err." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Always aim at complete harmony of thought and word and deed. Always aim at purifying your thoughts and everything will be well." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "There are people in the world so hungry, that God cannot appear to them except in the form of bread." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Nobody can hurt me without my permission." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "God has no religion." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description:
"Seven Deadly Sins
Wealth without work Pleasure without conscience Science without humanity Knowledge without character Politics without principle Commerce without morality Worship without sacrifice." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Each night, when I go to sleep, I die. And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Action expresses priorities." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Whenever you are confronted with an opponent. Conquer him with love." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Prayer is not asking. It is a longing of the soul. It is daily admission of one's weakness. It is better in prayer to have a heart without words than words without a heart." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description:
"Let the first act of every morning be to make the following resolve for the day:
- I shall not fear anyone on Earth. - I shall fear only God. - I shall not bear ill will toward anyone. - I shall not submit to injustice from anyone. - I shall conquer untruth by truth. And in resisting untruth, I shall put up with all suffering." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You don’t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Lobat add a quote by مهدی اخوان ثالث / Mehdi Akhavan Sales
item.description: "لحظه ی دیدار نزدیک است باز من دیوانه ام ، مستم باز می لرزد ، دلم ، دستم باز گویی در جهان دیگری هستم های ! نخراشی به غفلت گونه ام را ، تیغ های ، نپریشی صفای زلفکم را ، دست و آبرویم را نریزی ، دل ای نخورده مست لحظه ی دیدار نزدیک است" -- مهدی اخوان ثالث / Mehdi Akhavan Sales

item.title: Lobat add a quote by هوشنگ ابتهاج / Hooshang Ebtahaj
item.description: "آنكه مست آمد و دستي به دل ما زد و رفت/ در اين خانه ندانم به چه سودا زد و رفت/ خواست تنهايي ما را به رخ ما بكشد/ تعنه‌اي بر در اين خانه تنها زد و رفت" -- هوشنگ ابتهاج / Hooshang Ebtahaj

item.title: Lobat add a quote by فدریکو گارسیا لورکا
item.description: "درون هر چيزي رازي است و شعر، راز تمام چيزهاست" -- فدریکو گارسیا لورکا

item.title: Lobat add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed." -- Carl Gustav Jung
